sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState} from 'react'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper'; import FormControl from '@material-ui/core/FormControl'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { '& .MuiTextField-root': { margin: theme.spacing(1), width: '25ch', }, }, btn:{ margin: theme.spacing(6) } })); const ABMMedicoForm = ({ onAltaMedico }) => { const classes = useStyles(); const [showConfirmStep, setShowConfirmStep] = useState(false); const [values, setValues] = useState({ nombre: '', apellido: '', email:'', celular:'' }); const handleChange = (prop) => (event) => { setValues({ ...values, [prop]: event.target.value }); }; const onClick_1 = () => { !showConfirmStep ? setShowConfirmStep(true) : console.log(values); }; return (
{!showConfirmStep ? <>
: Nombre: {values.nombre} Apellido: {values.apellido} Email: {values.email} Celular: {values.celular} Nombre: {values.nombre} Apellido: {values.apellido} Email: {values.email} Celular: {values.celular} }
); } export default ABMMedicoForm;
